Title: 061: Discovering Data Science Workflows and The Importance of Mentorship
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Data Science Speaker Daniel Whitenack. You will hear about Pachyderm and what the company's mission is, discuss Data Science Workflows and how it's becoming a growing area in data science, learn about the Go Programming Language, and also know the importance of mentorship and the role it plays in both mentees and mentors.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/61
